ProjectTitle: Classics in the Classroom. Dutch canonical literature in upper-secondary education in Flanders and The Netherlands
InitialFeedbackHistory:
05/04/2024
Ethics: did you apply for privacy approval already via PRET? See https://admin.kuleuven.be/privacy; please add the number to your DMP upon approval and submit at intermediate
Preservation: please note that the KU Leuven RDM policy asks for 10 years of preservation of all relevant data: https://www.kuleuven.be/rdm/en/policy; will you also keep the recordings or can they be deleted after transcription? 
Sharing: note that pseudonymous data is still personal data according to the GDPR and can't be shared openly, either share under restricted access or make sure the data are fully anonymous without any way to re-identify the subjects. Upon depositing your date in a repository (DANS or RDR) you dataset will get a persistent identifier (DOI). a CC0 licence means anyone can reuse you data for any purpose without acknowledging you; if you like to be acknowledged/cited choose a CC-BY license, but if you need to keep access restricted you can't select a licence but need a data transfer agreement. For more information see: www.kuleuven.be/rdm/en/guidance/data-sharing
label: good with suggestions
